programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o harmon3.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ilow = p4 ;lowest value to harmonize aout diskin2 "sing.wav", 1, 0, 1 koct, kamp pitch aout, .01, 6, 10, 10 ;track pitch asig harmon3 aout, koct, .9, 1.5, 0.7, 0, ilow outs (asig + aout)*.4, (asig + aout)*.4 ;mix dry&wet signal
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i1 0 2.2 8.8 i1 3 2.2 8.2 i1 6 2.2 7.0
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
